general.name: Donald Jacamo
general.headline: Backend Developer | AI & Data Enthusiast
about: I'm Donald, a backend developer based in Costa Rica with 3+ years of experience in C#, Python, and Node.js. I'm passionate about building scalable APIs, integrating AI into finance, and crafting automated data-driven solutions.

My expertise includes developing RESTful APIs, implementing microservices architecture, and creating AI-powered financial analysis tools. I've successfully delivered projects for fintech companies and local businesses, focusing on performance optimization and security best practices.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy mentoring young professionals through educational initiatives and participating in community-impact projects in Latin America. I'm currently pursuing advanced studies in Data Science and Machine Learning.

certifications.name: Oracle Next Education G5 ‚Äì Backend Java + Spring Boot
MicroMasters Program in Statistics and Data Science

experiences.title: Backend Developer
experiences.description: Led development of TraderPal Connect API (B2B) using C# and ASP.NET Core. Implemented AI-powered features for financial analysis including stock recognition from images using OpenCV and TensorFlow. Built comprehensive dashboards in Power BI for real-time financial KPIs. Trained and deployed ML models for stock price prediction achieving 85% accuracy. Optimized API performance reducing response times by 40% through caching and database optimization.

experiences.title: Backend Developer & Consultant
experiences.description: Developed scalable backend solutions for 15+ local businesses using Python, Node.js, and C#. Integrated payment systems (Stripe, PayPal) and implemented secure authentication. Optimized database queries reducing load times by 60%. Built RESTful APIs and microservices architecture. Implemented automated testing and CI/CD pipelines. Provided technical consulting for digital transformation projects.

experiences.title: Junior Developer
experiences.description: Developed web applications using React and Node.js. Collaborated with senior developers on full-stack projects. Implemented responsive UI components and RESTful APIs. Participated in code reviews and agile development processes. Contributed to open-source projects and internal tooling.

education.subject: Information Technology
education.description: IT Engineering with emphasis on Web Development, Digital Marketing, and Software Architecture. GPA: 3.8/4.0. Relevant coursework: Database Systems, Software Engineering, Web Technologies, Data Structures & Algorithms.

education.subject: Statistics and Data Science
education.description: Currently enrolled in the MicroMasters from MITx focused on data analysis, machine learning, and AI. Courses include: Probability and Statistics, Machine Learning with Python, Data Analysis in Social Science.

education.subject: Computer Science
education.description: Completed 20+ online courses in backend development, cloud computing, and data science. Specialized in Azure development, AWS services, and machine learning applications.

volunteering.description: Contributed to social and technological initiatives in the local community of Nicaragua and Costa Rica. Led workshops on digital literacy and technology adoption for underserved communities. Organized hackathons and coding bootcamps for youth.

Guided high school students in career choices and delivered workshops on engineering and technology trends. Provided mentorship to 50+ students on career paths in technology. Created curriculum for introduction to programming and data science.

Mentored early-stage entrepreneurship teams, helping them prepare for seed funding competitions. Provided technical guidance on MVP development and business model validation. Assisted 10+ startups in developing their technology strategies.

projects.name: traderpal-connect
projects.description: A secure, scalable B2B API for financial services, integrating AI and OpenAPI-based documentation. Features include real-time stock data processing, AI-powered analysis, and comprehensive authentication. Handles 10,000+ requests per minute with 99.9% uptime.

projects.name: ai-stock-detector
projects.description: AI system for stock logo detection in images to enhance financial data pipelines. Uses computer vision and deep learning to identify company logos from screenshots and news articles. Achieves 92% accuracy in logo recognition across 500+ companies.

projects.name: nextjs-fintech-dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard for visualizing financial KPIs using Supabase and Power BI. Features real-time data visualization, customizable widgets, and integration with multiple financial data sources. Used by 5+ financial institutions for portfolio management.

projects.name: payment-gateway-api
projects.description: Secure payment processing API supporting multiple payment methods (Stripe, PayPal, local banks). Implements webhook handling, transaction logging, and fraud detection. Processes $2M+ in transactions monthly with 99.99% reliability.
